description.value: You can induce wound repair by circulating magic throughout your body. If you rest for 10 minutes, you regain Hit Points equal to your @Damage[(@actor.system.abilities.con.mod * floor(@actor.level/2))[healing]]{Constitution modifier Ã— half your level}. This is a magical healing effect and is cumulative with any healing you receive from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds].
